text: Silvia Avegno (born 15 June 1997 in Genoa) is an Italian water polo player. She was a member of the Italian women's national water polo team. She played at the 2018 Women's European Water Polo Championship and 2019 World Aquatics Championships. She played for Rapallo Pallanuoto. == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Italian water polo players Category:Sportspeople from Genoa
title: Silvia Avegno
